aluth adahasak wuwa da me surangana kathawe hidas rashiyak lekhakayata pene.wasara 17ka e.ja.pa palanaya bida damimata aththatama mulma wedi muraya thabuwe 1993 basnahira palath sabha mathiwaranaya nowa eeta pera pawathi dakunu palath sabha mathiwaranayayi.dakunu palatha sampradayikawama e.ja.pa yata awasi sahagatha “wamata bara“pradeshayaki.e.ja.pa rajayata wiruddhawa janatha wimukthi peramunu karalla darunulesa ma pawathune da enisa ma rajaye darunu mardhanayata wadath lakwa sitiye da dakunu palathayi.rajaya kerehi janathawa wadath ma kalakiri sitiye da dakunu palatha thulaya.kese wuwada me siyalu wasidayaka sadhaka matha pawa ema mathiwaranaya shri.la.ni.pa pramukha sabhagaya jayagaththe simitha chanda gananakini.(namuth kuprakata fransiskukaranaya nam kriyawaliya ha rajaya ha wipakshaya athara bala aragalaya thiyunu wima nisa dewana mathiwaranayak pawathwimata siduwu athara eyin wipakshaya pahadili jayak labiya).
